alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 10:56PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm could impact portions of northwestern Buffalo and southwestern Sherman Counties by 1145 PM CDT... At 1051 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a severe thunderstorm near Berwyn, or 12 miles east of Broken Bow, moving southeast at 35 mph. This storm is still at least 30 to 45 minutes away from potentially reaching Sherman and Buffalo counties, and it is unclear whether it will still be severe by the time it arrives in the area. However, if it does remain severe, a Severe Thunderstorm Warning may eventually be needed for parts of the area. This strong to potentially severe thunderstorm could be near... Litchfield around 1125 PM CDT. Hazard around 1135 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
